statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT customer_id, address, interests FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'female'
SELECT customer_id, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE interests LIKE '%sports%'
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers_table WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers_table WHERE customer_gender = 'M';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers_table WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT customer_name, preference_name FROM customers_table JOIN preferences_table ON customers_table.customer_id = preferences_table.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, preference_name FROM customers_table JOIN preferences_table ON customers_table.customer_id = preferences_table.customer_id ORDER BY customer_name DESC, preference_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers_table WHERE customer_gender = 'M' ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers_table WHERE customer_age < 30 AND customer_gender = 'F';

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, preference_name FROM customers_table JOIN preferences_table ON customers_table.customer_id = preferences_table.customer_id WHERE preference_name LIKE '%food%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers_table WHERE customer_gender = 'M';
SELECT customer_name, preference_name FROM customers_table LEFT JOIN preferences_table ON customers_table.customer_id = preferences_table.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE interest='Sports' AND subscribe_to_updates=true;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customer_data WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT customer_id, interest FROM customer_preferences WHERE age_group = '18-24' AND subscribe_to_updates = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE target_age_group = '25-40' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM customer_data JOIN customer_preferences ON customer_data.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id WHERE customer_data.name LIKE '%Mary%' AND customer_preferences.interest = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name='Smith';
SELECT preference_category, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.preference_category, p.preference_value FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.preference_category = 'Interest';
SELECT cr.click_count, cr.conversion_rate, cam.campaign_name FROM campaign_results cr JOIN campaigns cam ON cr.campaign_id = cam.campaign_id WHERE cr.customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < end_date;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, gender FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM preferences WHERE value = 'high';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE;
